00028 class GaussianKernel
00029 {
00030  public:
00034   GaussianKernel() : bandwidth(1.0), gamma(-0.5)
00035   { }
00036 
00042   GaussianKernel(double bandwidth) :
00043       bandwidth(bandwidth),
00044       gamma(-0.5 * pow(bandwidth, -2.0))
00045   { }
00046 
00058   template<typename VecType>
00059   double Evaluate(const VecType& a, const VecType& b) const
00060   {
00061     // The precalculation of gamma saves us a little computation time.
00062     return exp(gamma * metric::SquaredEuclideanDistance::Evaluate(a, b));
00063   }
00064 
00072   double Evaluate(double t) const
00073   {
00074     // The precalculation of gamma saves us a little computation time.
00075     return exp(gamma * t * t);
00076   }
00083   double Normalizer(size_t dimension)
00084   {
00085     return pow(sqrt(2.0 * M_PI) * bandwidth, dimension);
00086   }
00094   template<typename VecType>
00095   double ConvolutionIntegral(const VecType& a, const VecType& b)
00096   {
00097     return Evaluate(sqrt(metric::SquaredEuclideanDistance::Evaluate(a, b) / 2.0)) /
00098       (Normalizer(a.n_rows) * pow(2.0, (double) a.n_rows / 2.0));
00099   }
00100 
00101 
00103   double Bandwidth() const { return bandwidth; }
00106   void Bandwidth(const double bandwidth)
00107   {
00108     this->bandwidth = bandwidth;
00109     this->gamma = -0.5 * pow(bandwidth, -2.0);
00110   }
00111 
00113   double Gamma() const { return gamma; }
00114 
00115  private:
00117   double bandwidth;
00118 
00121   double gamma;
00122 };
